Root.p: The following moves are available to all acolytes to take when they level up.

move-description.p: When you attempt to reload quickly roll+Ag. On a 10+ you reload your weapon instantly - reset its uses and reduce your ammo by one. On a 7-9 the same in addition to what that the GM says. On a 6- you fumble your reload.
Same as spout lore but you need to justify how you know that forbidden knowledge.
